Buttons

다양한 크기, 상태 등을 지원하는 폼, 대화 상자 등의 작업에 부트 스트랩의 사용자 정의 단추 스타일을 사용하십시오.

Native

얘네들은 영향을 받으면 안 됨

a link 
<input type="button" value="input button">
<input type="submit" value="input submit">
<input type="reset" value="input reset">
<button type="button">button button</button>
<button type="submit">button submit</button>
<button type="reset">button reset</button>
<a href="#link">a link</a>

기본형

버튼 기본형태

<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--default">
  <span class="xu-button__text">(default)</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary">
  <span class="xu-button__text">primary</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--link">
  <span class="xu-button__text">link</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--subtle">
  <span class="xu-button__text">subtle</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--subtle-link">
  <span class="xu-button__text">subtle-link</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--warning">
  <span class="xu-button__text">warning</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--danger">
  <span class="xu-button__text">danger</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--default xu-button--selected">
  <span class="xu-button__text">selected all</span>
</button>

Size

버튼 사이즈

small a tag default a tag large a tag 
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--small">
  <span class="xu-button__text">small</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary">
  <span class="xu-button__text">default</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--large">
  <span class="xu-button__text">large</span>
</button>
<a href="#" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--small">
  <span class="xu-button__text">small a tag</span>
</a>
<a href="#" class="xu-button xu-button--primary">
  <span class="xu-button__text">default a tag</span>
</a>
<a href="#" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--large">
  <span class="xu-button__text">large a tag</span>
</a>

Block

블럭 형태

<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--default xu-button--block">
  <span class="xu-button__text">Block level button</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--block">
  <span class="xu-button__text">Block level button</span>
</button>

Active

active 상태, focus 상태, hover 상태

<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--active">
  <span class="xu-button__text">button active</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--focus">
  <span class="xu-button__text">button focus</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--hover">
  <span class="xu-button__text">button hover</span>
</button>

Disabled

비활성화 상태, 클래스와 attr 의 disabled 속성을 같이 적용

<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--default xu-button--disabled" disabled="disabled">
  <span class="xu-button__text">default</span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--disabled" disabled="disabled">
    <span class="xu-button__text">primary</span>
</button>

비활성화 상태, a 태그는 disabled 가 없음 클래스를 붙여서 적용

default primary 
<a href="#" class="xu-button xu-button--default xu-button--disabled" tabindex="-1" role="button" aria-disabled="true">
  <span class="xu-button__text">default</span>
</a>
<a href="#" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--disabled" tabindex="-1" role="button" aria-disabled="true">
  <span class="xu-button__text">primary</span>
</a>

Icon

아이콘 버튼
class="xu-button__icon" 영역 내부에 XEIcon 적용 또는 class="xu-button__icon"가 적용된 곳에 백그라운드 이미지를 적용하여 사용할 수 있습니다. 

<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--default xu-button--icon">
  <span class="xu-button__icon">
    <i class="xi-pen"></i>
  </span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--primary xu-button--icon">
  <span class="xu-button__icon">
    <i class="xi-pen"></i>
  </span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--warning xu-button--icon">
  <span class="xu-button__icon">
    <i class="xi-pen"></i>
  </span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--danger xu-button--icon">
  <span class="xu-button__icon">
    <i class="xi-pen"></i>
  </span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--default xu-button--icon xu-button--selected">
  <span class="xu-button__icon">
    <i class="xi-pen"></i>
  </span>
</button>
<button type="button" class="xu-button xu-button--subtle xu-button--icon">
  <span class="xu-button__icon">
    <i class="xi-pen"></i>
  </span>
</button>
